articles.title: GMA Hosts Amy Robach & TJ Holmes’ Affair Scandal Timeline - Vulture
articles.description: GMA3 co-hosts Amy Robach and T.J. Holmes have reportedly been dating since earlier this year, in a relationship that began as an affair. Here is a timeline of their drama, from meeting at Good Morning America to being pulled off the air.
articles.content: Over the past week, an embarrassment and we do mean that word of detail has come out about the alleged romance between GMA3 co-anchors T.J. Holmes and Amy Robach. Their rumored affair turned relation… [+8328 chars]

articles.title: Wang Leehom is holding a concert in Las Vegas in January, his first since divorce scandal - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Taiwan-based American singer will be performing at the Resorts World Las Vegas on Jan 28, 2023.
articles.content: Singer Wang Leehom will be holding a concert in January in Las Vegas, his first since he became embroiled in a messy divorce scandal in December 2021. The Taiwan-based American singer's comeback show… [+250 chars]

articles.title: Megadrought: How the current Southwestern North American megadrought is affecting Earth's upper atmosphere - EurekAlert
articles.description: New research, based on two decades’ worth of data, shows that in the ten years after its onset in 2000, the Southwestern North American (SWNA) megadrought caused a 30% change in gravity wave activity in Earth’s upper atmosphere.
articles.content:
